name: Customer CRM Database
description: Primary customer relationship management system containing contact information, purchase history, and interaction logs

name: Employee Payroll Files
description: Payroll records including salary, tax information, and bank account details

name: Public Marketing Website
description: Company public website with product information, blog posts, and contact forms

name: Internal SharePoint Site
description: Internal collaboration platform for documents, procedures, and team communications

name: Financial Data Warehouse
description: Consolidated financial data from all business units for reporting and analytics

name: Patient Medical Records System
description: Electronic health records including diagnoses, treatments, medications, and test results

name: Email Archive
description: Archived email communications for compliance and legal discovery

name: Product Images Repository
description: High-resolution product photography and marketing images

name: API Gateway Logs
description: API access logs including timestamps, IP addresses, and request/response data

name: Customer Support Tickets
description: Support ticket system with customer inquiries, issues, and resolution history

name: HR Benefits Database
description: Employee benefits information including health insurance, 401k, and life insurance

name: Security Camera Footage
description: Physical security camera recordings from all office locations

name: Product Catalog API
description: RESTful API providing product information, pricing, and availability to partners

name: Training Videos Library
description: Employee training videos and onboarding materials

name: Backup Archives
description: Encrypted backups of all production systems and databases

name: Social Media Analytics
description: Social media engagement data and analytics from all platforms

name: Vendor Contracts Repository
description: Signed contracts, NDAs, and agreements with all vendors

name: Development Code Repository
description: Source code, documentation, and version control for all applications

name: Quality Assurance Test Data
description: Test datasets used for QA including synthetic customer and transaction data

name: Sales Forecasting Models
description: Excel models and data files used for sales forecasting and planning
